title: Built But Still a 'Building'
thought: Why do we call them buildings if they’re already built?

title: Lips in Motion
thought: When you say 'forward' or 'backward,' your lips move in that direction.

title: Age = Sun Laps
thought: Your age is just the number of times you’ve orbited the sun.

title: The Last Pick-Up
thought: At some point, your parents put you down and never picked you up again.

title: A Wall With Options
thought: A door is just a wall with an opportunity.

title: The Most Patient Letter
thought: The word 'queue' is just a fancy way of saying 'Q.'

title: Uncomfortable Awareness
thought: Your tongue never really sits comfortably in your mouth.

title: The Odd 'E'
thought: Every odd number has an 'e' in it.

title: Fading From Memory
thought: One day, someone will say your name for the last time.

title: Skeletons in Waiting
thought: Technically, we all have skeletons inside us waiting to get out.

title: The Ultimate Mirror
thought: You’ve never actually seen your own face, only reflections and pictures.

title: Burrito Logic
thought: A burrito is just a sleeping bag for food.

title: The Silent Paradox
thought: If we can’t hear silence, does it really exist?

title: The Brain's Ego
thought: The brain named itself.

title: A Stranger's Password
thought: Someone’s mom probably uses your birthday as a password.

title: The Cruel Lisp
thought: The 's' in 'lisp' is kind of mean.

title: The Forgotten First Time
thought: You don’t remember the moment you fell asleep as a baby for the first time.

title: Infinite 'Now's'
thought: The present is just the past of the future.

title: Color Confusion
thought: Nothing is actually ‘clear,’ it just takes the color of its surroundings.

title: Mirrors Never Break
thought: They just multiply.

title: The Stomach’s Confusion
thought: Your stomach thinks all potatoes are mashed.

title: The Light-Speed Limit
thought: The faster you go, the slower time gets for you.

title: Your Own Personal Movie
thought: Your life is just one long, unedited POV shot.

title: The Real Life Tetris
thought: Packing a suitcase is just playing 3D Tetris.

title: Your Future’s Memory
thought: Your future self is watching you right now through memories.

title: The Slowest Thing in Space
thought: Everything on Earth is moving, but the North Pole is actually stationary.

title: Shadows Are Just Holes
thought: A shadow is just a hole in the light.

title: The Universe’s True Size
thought: If the universe is infinite, that means somewhere, another version of you is reading this right now.

title: Silent Conversations
thought: Reading is just hearing someone’s voice in your head.

title: The Earth's Sneaky Speed
thought: Even when you're standing still, you're moving at thousands of kilometers per hour on Earth.
